title: Couche-Tard Shares Rise After Sidelining M&A in New Outlook
description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. said it will focus more on organic growth and boosting its merchandise revenues as mergers and acquisitions were kept out of its latest financial outlook, sending the retailer’s stock price to its highest level since 2024.
content: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. said it will focus more on organic growth and boosting its merchandise revenues as mergers and acquisitions were kept out of its latest financial outlook, sending the retailer’s stock price to its highest level since 2024.
